title: Music - Background - Run Vol1
description: Exclusive pack of 20 ‘Run’ songs. Add energy and excitement to your games with our high-quality, dynamic soundtracks!
longDescription:
🏃‍♂️ ‘Run’ Music Pack for Games 🏃‍♂️


Youtube Demo: here


Speed up your game with the ‘Run’ style music pack. This pack contains 20 dynamic tracks, designed mainly for racing style games, but can be used in other styles.


Each track was composed to capture the emotion and intensity of a 'Run' game, providing a soundtrack that keeps players on the edge of their seats.


The songs are perfect for endless runner games, platformers, and other genres that require constant, fast movement. They are easy to integrate and fully compatible with Unreal Engine.


With this pack, you'll have the perfect soundtrack to keep your players running. Harness the energy and excitement that our ‘Run’ music pack for games has to offer and give your players the thrilling sound experience they deserve!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  1. Final Sprint
  2. Maximum Speed
  3. Race Against Time
  4. Adrenaline Pulse
  5. Turbo Challenge
  6. Champion’s Rhythm
  7. Electric Marathon
  8. Dynamic Acceleration
  9. Test Track
  10. Speed Legacy
  11. Ultra Velocity
  12. Runner’s Awakening
  13. Relentless Pursuit
  14. Swift Victory
  15. Track Euphoria
  16. Dawn Race
  17. Enchanted Turbo
  18. Speed Legend
  19. Metal Horizon
  20. Asphalt Triumph
  •  Channel: 2 channels
  •  Additional: Stereo
  • Encoding: PCM

Number of Audio Wavs: 20

Number of Audio Cues: 20

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16 bit

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 40:50

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://captainthatch.forgedream.com

Important/Additional Notes:
